Text saved: "The Hunger Games" is a story. It is set in the future. North America was gone.

The country's name is **Panem**. **Panem** is a country. It has twelve poor areas. A rich city rules these areas. This city's name is the **Capitol**. The **Capitol** has all control over **Panem**.

Each area makes different things. They give these things to the **Capitol**. The story starts in Area 12. Area 12 gives all the coal. Coal is a black rock. People burn coal for heat.

There was a thirteenth area. It fought the **Capitol** in the past. So, it was destroyed.
